title: Design Product Inventory View for SD LAN/WiFi
description:
Description
As an Offeringmanager I want to enable my Servicemanager/Accounter/Engineer to make changes of an existing SD-LAN/WiFi network fully automated in same Portal as Service is provisioned (Suggestion ServiceNow). To make this the Product Inventory View is needed. To implement the Product Inventory View it is necessary to design it.
  Approach:
Design Product Inventory View - Q1/23
Implement Product Inventory View - Q2/23
  Business Value: high (low/medium/high)  -> Schnellere Reaktionszeiten 
  Contact persons: 
Business Epic Owner: Kaspar DÃ¼tting
Business Owner Stefan Jung
Sales: Wilhelm Niemeier - Responsibilities are currently being clarified

Business Scope:
See the product inventory SDWLAN of the customer
acceptance_criteria: Clickdummy for Product Inventory View is available and has been approved for implementation
Required data for product inventory view has been identified (Excel)
